info.title: Viterbit API
info.description: This is the documentation for Viterbit's api

get.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve the details of a killer questions template.

post.description: Use this endpoint to create a hiring plan requisition.

location_id.description: This field is only required when the template has it defined with visibility **required**. When defined with visibility **hidden** should not be provided. Otherwise (**optional**) it will not be required

department_id.description: This field is only required when the template has it defined with visibility **required**. When defined with visibility **hidden** should not be provided. Otherwise (**optional**) it will not be required

hiring_manager_id.description:
***Generally, the person responsible for hiring and to whom you will report.***

This field is only required when the template has it defined with visibility **required**. When defined with visibility **hidden** should not be provided. Otherwise (**optional**) it will not be required

description.description: This field is only required when the template has it defined with visibility **required**. When defined with visibility **hidden** should not be provided. Otherwise (**optional**) it will not be required

requirements.description: This field is only required when the template has it defined with visibility **required**. When defined with visibility **hidden** should not be provided. Otherwise (**optional**) it will not be required

contract_type_id.description: This field is only required when the template has it defined with visibility **required**. When defined with visibility **hidden** should not be provided. Otherwise (**optional**) it will not be required

salary_periodicity.description: This field is only required when the template has it defined with visibility **required**. When defined with visibility **hidden** should not be provided. Otherwise (**optional**) it will not be required

experience_years.description: This field is only required when the template has it defined with visibility **required**. When defined with visibility **hidden** should not be provided. Otherwise (**optional**) it will not be required

education_type_id.description: This field is only required when the template has it defined with visibility **required**. When defined with visibility **hidden** should not be provided. Otherwise (**optional**) it will not be required

requisition_owner_id.description:
***Generally the person responsible for creating and managing job.***

This field is only required when the template has it defined with visibility **required**. Otherwise (**custom**) should not be provided.
